sqlMap.select:
SELECT A.EVTNAME, A.EVTIDNNO, A.EVTBRDATE, A.EVTAGE, B.REAPNO, B.APSEQ, B.RECOSDATE, B.REFEES, B.NONREFEES, B.REAMTPAY, B.HOSID, B.BENIDNNO, B.BENNAME, B.BENBRDATE, B.BENEVTREL, B.TEL1, B.TEL2, B.COMMZIP, B.COMMADDR, B.PAYTYP, B.BANKNAME, B.PAYBANKID, B.PAYEEACC, B.ACCIDN, B.ACCNAME, B.ACCREL, B.GRDIDNNO, B.GRDNAME, B.GRDBRDATE, B.EXEDATE, B.CRTUSER, B.UPDUSER, B.NOTIFYFORM FROM BAAPPBASE A, BABCML7 B WHERE (B.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# or B.REAPNO = #apNo:VARCHAR#)
B.APSEQ = #apSeq:NUMERIC#
and B.APNO = A.APNO(+) and B.PROCSTAT = '00' and A.SEQNO = '0000'

SELECT DISTINCT A.APNO, A.APSEQ, A.REAPNO, A.BENNAME, A.COMMADDR, A.NOTIFYFORM, A.REAMTPAY, A.REFEES, A.NONREFEES, A.PAYDATE, A.COMMZIP, A.COMMADDR, B.EVTNAME, B.EVTIDNNO, B.EVTBRDATE FROM BABCML7 A, BAAPPBASE B WHERE (A.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# or A.REAPNO = #apNo:VARCHAR#)
A.APSEQ = #apSeq:NUMERIC#
A.APSEQ = (Select max(C.APSEQ) FROM BABCML7 C WHERE (C.APNO= #apNo:VARCHAR# or C.REAPNO = #apNo:VARCHAR#))
and A.PROCSTAT='50' and A.APNO = B.APNO(+)

SELECT A.EVTNAME, A.EVTIDNNO, A.EVTBRDATE, A.EVTAGE, B.REAPNO, B.APSEQ, B.NOTIFYFORM, B.RECOSDATE, B.REFEES, B.NONREFEES, B.REAMTPAY, B.HOSID, B.BENIDNNO, B.BENNAME, B.BENBRDATE, B.BENEVTREL, B.TEL1, B.TEL2, B.COMMZIP, B.COMMADDR, B.PAYTYP, B.BANKNAME, B.PAYBANKID, B.PAYEEACC, B.ACCIDN, B.ACCNAME, B.ACCREL, B.GRDIDNNO, B.GRDNAME, B.GRDBRDATE, B.EXEDATE, B.CRTUSER, B.UPDUSER FROM BAAPPBASE A, BABCML7 B WHERE (B.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# or B.REAPNO = #apNo:VARCHAR#)
B.APSEQ = #apSeq:NUMERIC#
and B.APNO = A.APNO(+) and B.PROCSTAT = '50' and A.SEQNO = '0000' order by B.APSEQ
SELECT NVL(MAX(APSEQ), 0)+1 FROM BABCML7 WHERE REAPNO = #reApNo:VARCHAR#

SELECT B.REAPNO, B.APSEQ, B.APNO, B.PROCSTAT, B.INREDATE, B.REASCODE, B.HOSID, B.RECOSDATE, B.RENUM, B.REHPSTAY, B.REFEES, B.NONREFEES, B.REAMTPAY, B.NOTIFYFORM, B.BENIDNNO, B.BENNAME, B.BENBRDATE, B.BENSEX, B.BENNATIONTYP, B.BENNATIONCODE, B.BENEVTREL, B.TEL1, B.TEL2, B.COMMTYP, B.COMMZIP, B.COMMADDR, B.PAYTYP, B.BANKNAME, B.PAYBANKID, B.BRANCHID, B.PAYEEACC, B.ACCIDN, B.ACCNAME, B.ACCREL, B.MITRATE, B.GRDIDNNO, B.GRDNAME, B.GRDBRDATE, B.MEXCLVL, B.REALEXCLVL, B.CHKDATE, B.CHKMAN, B.RECHKDATE, B.RECHKMAN, B.EXEDATE, B.EXEMAN, B.PROMOTEUSER, B.CHKSTAT, B.RECHKSTAT, B.CONMK, B.CONDATE, B.CONMAN, B.REJMK, B.DRDATE, B.DRNO, B.PAYDATE, B.RPAYDATE, B.RTDATE, B.REPDATE, B.STEXPNDMK, B.STEXPNDREASON, B.STEXPNDDATE, B.BUREAUACC, B.CRTUSER, B.CRTTIME, B.UPDUSER, B.UPDTIME FROM BAAPPBASE A, BABCML7 B
1 = 0
A.EVTIDNNO = #evtIdnNo:VARCHAR#
(B.APNO = #reApNo:VARCHAR# OR B.REAPNO = #reApNo:VARCHAR#)
AND A.APNO = B.APNO AND A.SEQNO = '0000' AND B.PROCSTAT = '00'
ORDER BY B.APSEQ

SELECT A.REAPNO, A.APSEQ, A.APNO, A.PROCSTAT, A.INREDATE, A.REASCODE, A.HOSID, A.RECOSDATE, A.RENUM, A.REHPSTAY, A.REFEES, A.NONREFEES, A.REAMTPAY, A.NOTIFYFORM, A.BENIDNNO, A.BENNAME, A.BENBRDATE, A.BENSEX, A.BENNATIONTYP, A.BENNATIONCODE, A.BENEVTREL, A.TEL1, A.TEL2, A.COMMTYP, A.COMMZIP, A.COMMADDR, A.PAYTYP, A.BANKNAME, A.PAYBANKID, A.BRANCHID, A.PAYEEACC, A.ACCIDN, A.ACCNAME, A.ACCREL, A.MITRATE, A.GRDIDNNO, A.GRDNAME, A.GRDBRDATE, A.MEXCLVL, A.REALEXCLVL, A.CHKDATE, A.CHKMAN, A.RECHKDATE, A.RECHKMAN, A.EXEDATE, A.EXEMAN, A.PROMOTEUSER, A.CHKSTAT, A.RECHKSTAT, A.CONMK, A.CONDATE, A.CONMAN, A.REJMK, A.DRDATE, A.DRNO, A.PAYDATE, A.RPAYDATE, A.RTDATE, A.REPDATE, A.STEXPNDMK, A.STEXPNDREASON, A.STEXPNDDATE, A.BUREAUACC, A.CRTUSER, A.CRTTIME, A.UPDUSER, A.UPDTIME FROM BABCML7 A WHERE A.REAPNO = #reApNo:VARCHAR# AND A.APSEQ = #apSeq:NUMERIC#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO BABCML7 ( REAPNO, APSEQ, APNO, PROCSTAT, INREDATE, REASCODE, HOSID, RECOSDATE, RENUM, REHPSTAY, REFEES, NONREFEES, REAMTPAY, NOTIFYFORM, BENIDNNO, BENNAME, BENBRDATE, BENSEX, BENNATIONTYP, BENNATIONCODE, BENEVTREL, TEL1, TEL2, COMMTYP, COMMZIP, COMMADDR, PAYTYP, BANKNAME, PAYBANKID, BRANCHID, PAYEEACC, ACCNAME, CRTUSER, CRTTIME ) VALUES ( #reApNo:VARCHAR#, #apSeq:NUMERIC#, #apNo:VARCHAR#, '00', #inreDate:VARCHAR#, #reasCode:VARCHAR#, #hosId:VARCHAR#, #recosDate:VARCHAR#, #reNum:NUMERIC#, #rehpStay:NUMERIC#, #reFees:NUMERIC#, #nonreFees:NUMERIC#, #reAmtPay:NUMERIC#, #notifyForm:VARCHAR#, #benIdnNo:VARCHAR#, #benName:VARCHAR#, #benBrDate:VARCHAR#, #benSex:VARCHAR#, #benNationTyp:VARCHAR#, #benNationCode:VARCHAR#, #benEvtRel:VARCHAR#, #tel1:VARCHAR#, #tel2:VARCHAR#, #commTyp:VARCHAR#, #commZip:VARCHAR#, #commAddr:VARCHAR#, #payTyp:VARCHAR#, #bankName:VARCHAR#, #payBankId:VARCHAR#, #branchId:VARCHAR#, #payeeAcc:VARCHAR#, #accName:VARCHAR#, #crtUser:VARCHAR#, #crtTime:VARCHAR# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE BABCML7 SET INREDATE = #inreDate:VARCHAR#, REASCODE = #reasCode:VARCHAR#, HOSID = #hosId:VARCHAR#, RECOSDATE = #recosDate:VARCHAR#, RENUM = #reNum:NUMERIC#, REHPSTAY = #rehpStay:NUMERIC#, REFEES = #reFees:NUMERIC#, NONREFEES = #nonreFees:NUMERIC#, REAMTPAY = #reAmtPay:NUMERIC#, NOTIFYFORM = #notifyForm:VARCHAR#, BENIDNNO = #benIdnNo:VARCHAR#, BENNAME = #benName:VARCHAR#, BENBRDATE = #benBrDate:VARCHAR#, BENSEX = #benSex:VARCHAR#, BENNATIONTYP = #benNationTyp:VARCHAR#, BENNATIONCODE = #benNationCode:VARCHAR#, BENEVTREL = #benEvtRel:VARCHAR#, TEL1 = #tel1:VARCHAR#, TEL2 = #tel2:VARCHAR#, COMMTYP = #commTyp:VARCHAR#, COMMZIP = #commZip:VARCHAR#, COMMADDR = #commAddr:VARCHAR#, PAYTYP = #payTyp:VARCHAR#, BANKNAME = #bankName:VARCHAR#, PAYBANKID = #payBankId:VARCHAR#, BRANCHID = #branchId:VARCHAR#, PAYEEACC = #payeeAcc:VARCHAR#, ACCNAME = #accName:VARCHAR#, UPDUSER = #updUser:VARCHAR#, UPDTIME = #updTime:VARCHAR# WHERE REAPNO = #reApNo:VARCHAR# AND APSEQ = #apSeq:NUMERIC#
UPDATE BABCML7 SET PROCSTAT = '99' WHERE REAPNO = #reApNo:VARCHAR# AND APSEQ = #apSeq:NUMERIC#
sqlMap.select: SELECT B.REAPNO, B.APSEQ, B.APNO, B.PROCSTAT, B.INREDATE, B.REASCODE, B.HOSID, B.RECOSDATE, B.RENUM, B.REHPSTAY, B.REFEES, B.NONREFEES, B.REAMTPAY, B.NOTIFYFORM, B.BENIDNNO, B.BENNAME, B.BENBRDATE, B.BENSEX, B.BENNATIONTYP, B.BENNATIONCODE, B.BENEVTREL, B.TEL1, B.TEL2, B.COMMTYP, B.COMMZIP, B.COMMADDR, B.PAYTYP, B.BANKNAME, B.PAYBANKID, B.BRANCHID, B.PAYEEACC, B.ACCIDN, B.ACCNAME, B.ACCREL, B.MITRATE, B.GRDIDNNO, B.GRDNAME, B.GRDBRDATE, B.MEXCLVL, B.REALEXCLVL, B.CHKDATE, B.CHKMAN, B.RECHKDATE, B.RECHKMAN, B.EXEDATE, B.EXEMAN, B.PROMOTEUSER, B.CHKSTAT, B.RECHKSTAT, B.CONMK, B.CONDATE, B.CONMAN, B.REJMK, B.DRDATE, B.DRNO, B.PAYDATE, B.RPAYDATE, B.RTDATE, B.REPDATE, B.STEXPNDMK, B.STEXPNDREASON, B.STEXPNDDATE, B.BUREAUACC, B.CRTUSER, B.CRTTIME, B.UPDUSER, B.UPDTIME, C.PARAMNAME AS REASNAME, D.HPSNAM AS HOSNAME, E.PARAMNAME AS BENEVTRELNAME, F.CNAME AS BENNATIONNAME, G.PARAMNAME AS PAYTYPNAME FROM BAAPPBASE A, BABCML7 B, BAPARAM C, BCPHP D, BAPARAM E, BACOUNTRY F, BAPARAM G WHERE (B.APNO = #reApNo:VARCHAR# OR B.REAPNO = #reApNo:VARCHAR#) AND A.APNO = B.APNO AND A.SEQNO = '0000' AND B.PROCSTAT = '00' AND B.REASCODE = C.PARAMCODE (+) AND C.PARAMUSEMK (+) ='Y' AND C.PARAMGROUP (+) = 'REASCODE' AND B.HOSID = D.HPCODE (+) AND B.BENEVTREL = E.PARAMCODE (+) AND E.PARAMUSEMK (+) ='Y' AND E.PARAMGROUP (+) = 'RELATION' AND B.BENNATIONCODE = LPAD(F.COUNTRY_ID (+), 3, '0') AND B.PAYTYP = G.PARAMCODE (+) AND G.PARAMUSEMK (+) ='Y' AND G.PARAMGROUP (+) = 'PAYTYPE' ORDER BY B.APSEQ

SELECT A.REAPNO, A.APSEQ, A.APNO, A.PROCSTAT, A.INREDATE, A.REASCODE, A.HOSID, A.RECOSDATE, A.RENUM, A.REHPSTAY, A.REFEES, A.NONREFEES, A.REAMTPAY, A.NOTIFYFORM, A.BENIDNNO, A.BENNAME, A.BENBRDATE, A.BENSEX, A.BENNATIONTYP, A.BENNATIONCODE, A.BENEVTREL, A.TEL1, A.TEL2, A.COMMTYP, A.COMMZIP, A.COMMADDR, A.PAYTYP, A.BANKNAME, A.PAYBANKID, A.BRANCHID, A.PAYEEACC, A.ACCIDN, A.ACCNAME, A.ACCREL, A.MITRATE, A.GRDIDNNO, A.GRDNAME, A.GRDBRDATE, A.MEXCLVL, A.REALEXCLVL, A.CHKDATE, A.CHKMAN, A.RECHKDATE, A.RECHKMAN, A.EXEDATE, A.EXEMAN, A.PROMOTEUSER, A.CHKSTAT, A.RECHKSTAT, A.CONMK, A.CONDATE, A.CONMAN, A.REJMK, A.DRDATE, A.DRNO, A.PAYDATE, A.RPAYDATE, A.RTDATE, A.REPDATE, A.STEXPNDMK, A.STEXPNDREASON, A.STEXPNDDATE, A.BUREAUACC, A.CRTUSER, A.CRTTIME, A.UPDUSER, A.UPDTIME FROM BABCML7 A WHERE A.REAPNO = #reApNo:VARCHAR# AND A.APSEQ = #apSeq:NUMERIC#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE BABCML7 SET PROCSTAT = '20', CHKDATE = #chkDate:VARCHAR#, CHKMAN = #chkMan:VARCHAR#, UPDUSER = #updUser:VARCHAR#, UPDTIME = #updTime:VARCHAR# WHERE REAPNO = #reApNo:VARCHAR# AND APSEQ = #apSeq:NUMERIC# AND PROCSTAT = '00'
sqlMap.select: SELECT B.REAPNO, B.APSEQ, B.APNO, B.PROCSTAT, B.INREDATE, B.REASCODE, B.HOSID, B.RECOSDATE, B.RENUM, B.REHPSTAY, B.REFEES, B.NONREFEES, B.REAMTPAY, B.NOTIFYFORM, B.BENIDNNO, B.BENNAME, B.BENBRDATE, B.BENSEX, B.BENNATIONTYP, B.BENNATIONCODE, B.BENEVTREL, B.TEL1, B.TEL2, B.COMMTYP, B.COMMZIP, B.COMMADDR, B.PAYTYP, B.BANKNAME, B.PAYBANKID, B.BRANCHID, B.PAYEEACC, B.ACCIDN, B.ACCNAME, B.ACCREL, B.MITRATE, B.GRDIDNNO, B.GRDNAME, B.GRDBRDATE, B.MEXCLVL, B.REALEXCLVL, B.CHKDATE, B.CHKMAN, B.RECHKDATE, B.RECHKMAN, B.EXEDATE, B.EXEMAN, B.PROMOTEUSER, B.CHKSTAT, B.RECHKSTAT, B.CONMK, B.CONDATE, B.CONMAN, B.REJMK, B.DRDATE, B.DRNO, B.PAYDATE, B.RPAYDATE, B.RTDATE, B.REPDATE, B.STEXPNDMK, B.STEXPNDREASON, B.STEXPNDDATE, B.BUREAUACC, B.CRTUSER, B.CRTTIME, B.UPDUSER, B.UPDTIME, C.PARAMNAME AS REASNAME, D.HPSNAM AS HOSNAME, E.PARAMNAME AS BENEVTRELNAME, F.CNAME AS BENNATIONNAME, G.PARAMNAME AS PAYTYPNAME FROM BAAPPBASE A, BABCML7 B, BAPARAM C, BCPHP D, BAPARAM E, BACOUNTRY F, BAPARAM G WHERE (B.APNO = #reApNo:VARCHAR# OR B.REAPNO = #reApNo:VARCHAR#) AND A.APNO = B.APNO AND A.SEQNO = '0000' AND B.PROCSTAT = '20' AND B.REASCODE = C.PARAMCODE (+) AND C.PARAMUSEMK (+) ='Y' AND C.PARAMGROUP (+) = 'REASCODE' AND B.HOSID = D.HPCODE (+) AND B.BENEVTREL = E.PARAMCODE (+) AND E.PARAMUSEMK (+) ='Y' AND E.PARAMGROUP (+) = 'RELATION' AND B.BENNATIONCODE = LPAD(F.COUNTRY_ID (+), 3, '0') AND B.PAYTYP = G.PARAMCODE (+) AND G.PARAMUSEMK (+) ='Y' AND G.PARAMGROUP (+) = 'PAYTYPE' ORDER BY B.APSEQ

SELECT A.REAPNO, A.APSEQ, A.APNO, A.PROCSTAT, A.INREDATE, A.REASCODE, A.HOSID, A.RECOSDATE, A.RENUM, A.REHPSTAY, A.REFEES, A.NONREFEES, A.REAMTPAY, A.NOTIFYFORM, A.BENIDNNO, A.BENNAME, A.BENBRDATE, A.BENSEX, A.BENNATIONTYP, A.BENNATIONCODE, A.BENEVTREL, A.TEL1, A.TEL2, A.COMMTYP, A.COMMZIP, A.COMMADDR, A.PAYTYP, A.BANKNAME, A.PAYBANKID, A.BRANCHID, A.PAYEEACC, A.ACCIDN, A.ACCNAME, A.ACCREL, A.MITRATE, A.GRDIDNNO, A.GRDNAME, A.GRDBRDATE, A.MEXCLVL, A.REALEXCLVL, A.CHKDATE, A.CHKMAN, A.RECHKDATE, A.RECHKMAN, A.EXEDATE, A.EXEMAN, A.PROMOTEUSER, A.CHKSTAT, A.RECHKSTAT, A.CONMK, A.CONDATE, A.CONMAN, A.REJMK, A.DRDATE, A.DRNO, A.PAYDATE, A.RPAYDATE, A.RTDATE, A.REPDATE, A.STEXPNDMK, A.STEXPNDREASON, A.STEXPNDDATE, A.BUREAUACC, A.CRTUSER, A.CRTTIME, A.UPDUSER, A.UPDTIME FROM BABCML7 A WHERE A.REAPNO = #reApNo:VARCHAR# AND A.APSEQ = #apSeq:NUMERIC#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE BABCML7 SET PROCSTAT = #procStat:VARCHAR#, EXEDATE = #exeDate:VARCHAR#, EXEMAN = #exeMan:VARCHAR#, UPDUSER = #updUser:VARCHAR#, UPDTIME = #updTime:VARCHAR# WHERE REAPNO = #reApNo:VARCHAR# AND APSEQ = #apSeq:NUMERIC#
sqlMap.select: SELECT REAPNO ,APSEQ ,APNO ,INREDATE ,RECOSDATE ,REFEES ,NONREFEES ,REAMTPAY ,PAYDATE FROM BABCML7 WHERE APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# ORDER BY APSEQ

SELECT REAPNO ,APSEQ ,APNO ,PROCSTAT ,INREDATE ,(SELECT PARAMNAME FROM BAPARAM WHERE PARAMGROUP = 'REASCODE' AND PARAMCODE = REASCODE) AS REASCODE ,HOSID ,RECOSDATE ,RENUM ,REHPSTAY ,REFEES ,NONREFEES ,REAMTPAY ,NOTIFYFORM ,BENIDNNO ,BENNAME ,BENBRDATE ,BENSEX ,BENNATIONTYP ,BENNATIONCODE ,(SELECT NVL(CNAME, '') FROM BACOUNTRY WHERE LPAD(COUNTRY_ID, 3, '0') = BENNATIONCODE) AS BENNATIONNAME ,BENEVTREL ,TEL1 ,TEL2 ,COMMTYP ,COMMZIP ,COMMADDR ,PAYTYP ,BANKNAME ,PAYBANKID ,BRANCHID ,PAYEEACC ,ACCNAME ,ACCREL ,(SELECT PARAMNAME FROM BAPARAM WHERE PARAMGROUP = 'RECHKLVL' AND PARAMCODE = REALEXCLVL) AS REALEXCLVL ,CHKDATE ,CHKMAN ,RECHKDATE ,RECHKMAN ,EXEDATE ,EXEMAN ,CHKSTAT ,RECHKSTAT ,PAYDATE ,RPAYDATE ,RTDATE ,REPDATE ,(SELECT PARAMNAME FROM BAPARAM WHERE PARAMGROUP = 'STEXPNDREASON' AND PARAMCODE = STEXPNDREASON) AS STEXPNDREASON ,STEXPNDDATE FROM BABCML7 WHERE REAPNO = #reApNo:VARCHAR# AND APSEQ = #apSeq:VARCHAR# AND APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR#
